Well look at league, if it isn't coded as a champion its coded as a minion. lol

That's fuckin hilarious, that's the first game i have ever heard of that as banned people for overclocking their PC's, what i don't get is that my PC is overclocked and it worked fine which i really wish it didn't so my mate would leave me the fuck alone about playing that game, i thought the game was ok to just play once in awhile with a few mates but other than that the game was fuckin garbage.

So it is because the game relies on your computer's clock or something? As your clock runs faster than intended, and because some older hardwares will fail to report and update this to the game engine, it results in your game run faster than intended.

They should just add a software clock inside the game but probably not do-able without relying on hardwares tho.

Or maybe do a check on the timer between the server and client, and updates the client's game clock by multiplying the necessary factor to make them equal, and set this check to perform every time you log in.
